snippet.title: Phantom Brigade Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Phantom Brigade is a cinematic turn-based mech tactics game, with innovative combat.

Wishlist now on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/553540/Phantom_Brigade/

Developed by Brace Yourself Games, creators of Crypt of the NecroDancer and Industries of Titan!

Website: http://braceyourselfgames.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/BYG_Vancouver
Facebook: http://facebook.com/BraceYourselfGames

Audio by Power Up Audio: https://twitter.com/PowerUpAudio
Actors, in order of appearance: Elspeth Eastman, Omari Newton
